name: winslow-bot
author: Philipp Zelinski <43653566+nieopierzony@users.noreply.github.com>

scripts.backend: cd backend && npm run checkDependencies && set MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost:27017/winslow-bot; && npm run dev
scripts.frontend: cd frontend && npm run checkDependencies && npm run serve
scripts.mongo:start: npm run mongo:prepare && "D:/Program Files/MongoDB/Server/4.4/bin/mongod" --dbpath mongodb_tmp --logappend --logpath nul
scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run --silent start:dev
scripts.start:dev: concurrently --kill-others -n 'frontend,backend,mongo' -c 'blue,red,green' "npm run frontend" "npm run backend" "npm run mongo:start"

comment: Before running, make sure you have downloaded Mongo Server https://www.mongodb.com/try/download/community
